name: Adventure in Kana Village-Kanji Plan
detailed_description:
This DLC contains the following features:


1. Integrate more than 2,100 Japanese Kanji;
2. Independent search page, and can view related definitions in Wiki;
3. Daily study plan;
4. Common website collections, such as Google Translate, Bing Translate, NHK, etc.
(I used HTML for development so that you can add and modify the code yourself)
5. Can run on multiple platforms (Window, Andriod, IOS, etc.)


*Some features require networking
about_the_game:
This DLC contains the following features:


1. Integrate more than 2,100 Japanese Kanji;
2. Independent search page, and can view related definitions in Wiki;
3. Daily study plan;
4. Common website collections, such as Google Translate, Bing Translate, NHK, etc.
(I used HTML for development so that you can add and modify the code yourself)
5. Can run on multiple platforms (Window, Andriod, IOS, etc.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: winXP
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz or above
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 9.0 supported card / 1280 x 720 or above
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

legal_notice:
一、游戏中所有立绘、CG、部分音乐为原创素材，未经允许禁止挪用。

二、禁止对游戏进行解包，以及由此衍生的、包含且不限于：擅自提取并挪用、发布游戏的素材资源等行为。

三、游戏中所使用的部分音乐、场景、图块、插件为授权素材，著作权归属于原作者，如果使用请咨询原作者。

四、禁止任何团体或者个人对游戏进行二次发布。

五、违反上述声明，后果自负。
